channel.title: CVE Feed for Debian -- x11-common
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Debian -- x11-common

item.title: CVE-2012-1093|2024-08-06T18:45:27.483Z -- debian -- x11-common
item.description: The init script in the Debian x11-common package before 1:7.6+12 is vulnerable to a symlink attack that can lead to a privilege escalation during package installation.
